Alex Teal

A Software Developer, Music Lover, Tech Enthusiast.

My name is Alex Teal.

Born and raised in South Carolina, I've always had a passion for anything and everything computers. That's what pushed me through my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and into my career as a software engineer. I've had about 5 years experience professionally, but many years learning and non-professional experience.

Starting in the Java world, moving to the Ruby on Rails world, and eventually to Javascript front ends and APIs; I have loved every moment of my career and look forward to continuing that in the future.

I look forward for the opportunity to learn about your business and be able to assist you in continuing that vision forward.
